GSD.description:
atlantic: Fix OOB read and write in hw_atl_utils_fw_rpc_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.164 by commit 89d15a2e40d7edaaa16da2763b349dd7b056cc09. For more details please see the references link.
